Class CSVUtils

java.lang.Object
CSVUtils
public class CSVUtils extends Object
Utility class for common CSV operations to reduce code duplication. Provides methods for reading internships, finding column indices, and parsing data.

    • readInternshipsFromCSV

      public static List<Internships> readInternshipsFromCSV(Predicate<Internships> filter)
      Reads all internships from CSV that match a filter condition.
      Parameters:
      filter - Predicate to filter internships (null for all)
      Returns:
      List of matching internships

      Builds a map of column names to their indices.

      Parses a CSV row into an Internships object.

    • updateCSV

      public static boolean updateCSV(String filePath, Function<String[],String[]> transformer)
      Updates a CSV file by applying a row transformer function.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file
      transformer - Function that takes a row and returns updated row (or null to skip)
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded

      public static Internships findInternshipByTitle(List<Internships> internships, String title)
